mean_cn: v. 免费搭乘他人便车
mean_en: to get a ride in a passing vehicle by holding out your arm with your thumb up as you stand on the side of the road
sentence: I'm hitchhiking across the country; I'm just waiting for another stranger's car to pick me up.
sentence_trans: 我现在在搭便车游全国；我现在只需等待另一个陌生人搭我上路。
word_etyma: hitch搭乘他人之车+hike骑车 → 搭便车
